informalexample.para: To manage your saved filters, select the MANAGE button. The following screen will appear:
The "Saved Filter Sets" screen displays information on all existing saved filters, including filter name and shared status.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the previous screen.
Highlight a filter and then select this button to make the filter available to other users.
Highlight a filter and then select this button to make the filter private.
Highlight a filter and then select this button to remove the filter from the list of saved filter sets.

caution.para: Think twice before deleting a shared filter. Other people may be using it.
